name: Fitness Fruit Friends
description:
In Fitness Fruit Friends, the characters go to the gym together to become stronger! There are different fruits that you can choose to help in the gym, improving their workouts!

Created for the Brackeys 2021.1 Game Jam.

Robert: Lead Fruit Visual Interpreter
Jake: Lord of the Fruit Lore
Karina: Admiral of Computer Technics
Elena: Conductor of Cochlear Inputs

DOWNLOAD: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1OGVw96BoXPZZ6iPMM_f_dQI000A06fGQ?usp=sha...
